title: Elementary Mathematics Inquiry-Based Online Learning Course Through Graph Software Utilization

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Graph Interpretation Skills and Fundamental Smartphone Operation Techniques
context.additional_context: Professionals learn to apply elementary mathematics concepts to real-life problem-solving, utilizing smartphone-based graphing software and project-based assessment

learning_goals: Visualize and analyze slope changes using smartphone-based graphing software
Generate mathematical models applicable to elementary-level science problems based on graph interpretation results
Share graph analysis results with peer learners via collaborative tools and propose improvements incorporating feedback

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
